search_nasa_twitter_post.name: search_nasa_twitter_post
search_nasa_twitter_post.description: Use the '/tools/bing/searchv2' API to search for the NASA Twitter post from 2023 featuring two sleeping astronauts.

open_webpage_with_browser.name: open_webpage_with_browser
open_webpage_with_browser.description: Open the web page with the first URL obtained from the search results using a web browser.

observe_webpage_for_information.name: observe_webpage_for_information
observe_webpage_for_information.description: Observe the current page for the specific post with the photo of two sleeping astronauts and extract the publication date.

format_date.name: format_date
format_date.description: Format the extracted date into MM:DD format, ensuring to include leading zeros if necessary.
